product_name: Feedback Sports Velo Wall Bike Storage Rack
long_description: A sturdy bike storage rack for your home or garage, the Feedback Sports Velo Wall Bike Storage Rack screws into any standard wall stud. Rack features soft rubber to protect the finish of your bike frame. Cradle arms can be independently adjusted to hold all types and sizes of bikes. Cradle distance from wall is 13.5 in. and load capacity is 70 lbs.
short_description: A sturdy bike storage rack for your home or garage, the Feedback Sports Velo Wall Bike Storage Rack screws into any standard wall stud.
